component.name: Security Center
component.summary: Manage your system security, firewall and services

description.p: Security Center is a modern application for managing system security on Linux. It provides a comprehensive and user-friendly interface for controlling your firewall, monitoring network exposure, and managing system services.

ul.li: Firewall management with firewalld integration
Open and block ports with custom rules
Enable and disable network services
Configure firewall zones
Monitor network exposure and listening ports
Quick actions for common administrative tasks
System services management via systemd
Real-time traffic and connection statistics
Consolidated port view â€” same-port entries grouped into single rows
Improved firewall state display with three states (Active, Panic Mode, Inactive)
Traffic switch is disabled when firewall is stopped to prevent errors
Dashboard status now syncs correctly after Quick Actions changes
Fixed restart button stretching on the dashboard
Eliminated signal feedback loops causing error spam

description.p: Initial release of Security Center with the following features:

ul.li: Firewall status overview and quick toggle
Port management (open, block, remove rules)
Service management for firewalld services
Zone configuration and management
Network exposure monitoring
Quick administrative actions
System services management
Traffic and connection statistics with charts
